actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

official_title: A bill to designate the Federal Building located at 10 Causeway Street in Boston, Massachusetts, as the "Thomas P. O'Neill Jr. Federal Building".

summary.text: Designates the Federal building located on Causeway Street, Boston, Massachusetts, as the Thomas P. O'Neill, Jr., Federal Building.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal Building located at 10 Causeway Street in Boston, Massachusetts, as the "Thomas P. O'Neill Jr. Federal Building".
